dashboard.title: Mission Map
dashboard.subtitle: Real-time flight tracking
dashboard.manualInstructions: Use Arrow keys to steer. Switch to Auto with the Control button.

tooltip.red: Critical: charge {{charge}}% and cell temperature {{temp}}°C (needs ≥30% and 10–45°C).

green.nominal: Nominal link quality. Latency {{latency}} ms, video {{bitrate}} Mb/s.

yellow.bitrate: Caution: video bitrate {{bitrate}} Mb/s (2–6 Mb/s band).

red.latency: Critical: latency {{latency}} ms exceeds 250 ms limit.
red.bitrate: Critical: video bitrate {{bitrate}} Mb/s below 2 Mb/s.

tooltip.green: Running on grid power. UPS standby {{level}}%.
Dock weather nominal: average {{avg}} m/s, gust {{gust}} m/s, precipitation {{precipitation}}.
tooltip.yellow: Caution wind: average {{avg}} m/s, gust {{gust}} m/s (8–12 m/s).
tooltip.red: Critical wind: average {{avg}} m/s, gust {{gust}} m/s (>12 m/s).

missionPlanner.title: Mission Planner
missionPlanner.clickToAddWaypoints: Click on the map to add waypoints. Drag markers to reposition.
missionPlanner.addWaypointsForTimeline: Add waypoints to see mission timeline

help.title: Help & Features
help.subtitle: Discover all the powerful features and capabilities of the AISP platform

missionControl.desc: The Mission Control dashboard provides real-time monitoring and control of drone operations.
missionControl.realTimeMap: Real-time map visualization showing drone position, heading, and flight path
missionControl.videoFeeds: Live video feeds from RGB and thermal cameras with expandable view
missionControl.telemetry: Comprehensive telemetry data including speed, altitude, battery, GPS, and signal strength
missionControl.manualMode: Manual control mode using arrow keys or on-screen controls for direct drone steering
missionControl.autoMode: Automatic mode where the drone navigates autonomously with boundary collision detection
missionControl.controls: Mission controls: Pause, Return to Home, and switch between Manual/Auto modes

missionPlanner.desc: Plan and manage flight routes by creating waypoints on the map.
missionPlanner.addWaypoints: Click on the map to add waypoints to your mission route
missionPlanner.editWaypoints: Edit waypoint names and reposition markers by dragging
missionPlanner.timeline: View mission timeline with estimated arrival times at each waypoint
missionPlanner.saveRoute: Save mission routes for future use

alertCenter.desc: Centralized hub for managing and responding to security alerts and incidents.
alertCenter.viewAlerts: View all active, investigating, and resolved alerts
alertCenter.filter: Filter alerts by status (Active, Investigating, Resolved) and type (Security, Fire, Intrusion, Equipment)
alertCenter.details: View detailed alert information including location, timestamp, description, images, and videos

fleet.desc: Monitor and manage your drone fleet and docking stations.
fleet.drones: View status, battery level, location, and current mission for each drone
fleet.dockingStations: Monitor docking station status, capacity, temperature, and humidity
fleet.status: Track operational status: Active, Mission, Docked, Error, Charging, Maintenance
fleet.logs: Access operational logs for each drone and docking station

archive.desc: Access historical mission data and recordings.
archive.viewMissions: Browse completed, failed, and cancelled missions
archive.filter: Filter missions by status and date range (Today, This Week, This Month, All Dates)
archive.details: View mission details including start/end times, duration, waypoints, and media
archive.download: Download mission images, videos, and operational logs

settings.preferences: Adjust application preferences and display options

general.title: General Features
general.mapDesc: Interactive map with satellite view, controlled area boundaries, mission paths, drone traces, and alert markers. Toggle layers to customize your view.
general.videoDesc: Live video streams from RGB (color) and thermal (infrared) cameras. Expand videos to full screen, take photos, and save video clips.
general.telemetryDesc: Monitor drone data (bearing, speed, altitude, battery) and docking station information (temperature, humidity, flood status, docking status).

quickTips.title: Quick Tips
quickTips.tip1: Use arrow keys in Manual mode for precise drone control
quickTips.tip2: Click on the map in Mission Planner to add waypoints
quickTips.tip3: Filter alerts by type and status for faster navigation
quickTips.tip4: Expand video feeds by clicking the expand button
